mapper.select: SELECT CARDCUT_NO, TITLE, LINK, DESCRIPTION, PUBDATE FROM CARDCUT ORDER BY CARDCUT_NO

SELECT CARDCUT_NO, TITLE, LINK, DESCRIPTION, PUBDATE FROM CARDCUT WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE = #{title}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchTitle}||'%'
ORDER BY CARDCUT_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CARDCUT
WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE = #{title}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchTitle}||'%'

SELECT C.CARDCUT_NO, C.TITLE, C.LINK, C.PUBDATE, C.DESCRIPTION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CARDCUT_REPLY WHERE C_CARDCUT_NO = #{cardCutNo}) as reply_cnt, C.CARDCUT_NO AS R_C_CARDCUT_NO, R.C_REPLY_NO AS R_C_REPLY_NO, R.C_REPLY_CONTENT AS R_C_REPLY_CONTENT, R.C_WRITER_NO AS R_C_WRITER_NO, R.C_REPLY_REGISTER AS R_C_REPLY_REGISTER, R.C_REPLY_MODIFY AS R_C_REPLY_MODIFY, U.USER_ID AS R_C_USER_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME AS R_C_USER_NICKNAME FROM CARDCUT C LEFT OUTER JOIN CARDCUT_REPLY R ON (C.CARDCUT_NO = R.C_CARDCUT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T U ON (R.C_WRITER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE C.CARDCUT_NO = #{cardCutNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARDCUT_REPLY (C_REPLY_NO, C_CARDCUT_NO, C_REPLY_CONTENT, C_WRITER_NO, C_REPLY_REGISTER, C_REPLY_MODIFY) VALUES( SEQ_C_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{cardCutNo}, #{c_reply_content}, #{c_writer_no}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE CARDCUT_REPLY SET C_REPLY_CONTENT = #{c_reply_content} WHERE C_REPLY_NO = #{c_reply_no}
